title: Chvrches.Coachella.Valley.Music.Fest.(2014-04-19)
description:
This (incomplete) set, by a band I had hitherto never heard of, and would probably never have heard of until I downloaded a single day's coverage (26 Gigs) of the yearly Coachella Valley music festival via the only means available to me (ie. torrent), to my surprise, I actually liked!

The set includes the following songs:
------------------------------------
1. We Sink
2. Recover
3. Tether
4. Under The Tide
5. Mother We Share

Whereas the complete set for that concert actually includes 4 or 5 additional songs.

The video is a 1080p NTSC AVI with the following details:

On my machine the picture becomes pixelated a points (typically when the bitrate exceeds 10 Mbps) but that's because I have a low-end machine. A high-end machine with a powerful video card with oodles of VRAM should be able to render this video perfectly from beginning to end.

- Me
